exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Push-ups are a great bodyweight exercise that target the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: The bench press is a classic exercise for building upper body strength, focusing on the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Chest Flyes
exercises.description: Chest flyes are an isolation exercise that primarily targets the chest muscles, helping to develop definition and size.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: The incline bench press targets the upper part of the chest, as well as the shoulders and triceps.

exercises.name: Decline Bench Press
exercises.description: The decline bench press targets the lower part of the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Push-up Variations (Diamond, Wide, etc.)
exercises.description: Variations of push-ups target different parts of the chest, triceps, and shoulders.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Bicep curls are a basic strength training exercise that targets the biceps brachii muscle.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: Hammer curls are an effective exercise for building size and strength in the biceps and forearms.

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.description: Preacher curls are a bicep exercise that isolates the muscle, helping to build size and definition.

exercises.name: Concentration Curls
exercises.description: Concentration curls isolate the biceps for improved strength and definition.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: Tricep dips are a bodyweight exercise that target the triceps, shoulders, and chest muscles.

exercises.name: Tricep Extensions
exercises.description: Tricep extensions are an isolation exercise that primarily target the triceps muscle.

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.description: Skull crushers, also known as lying tricep extensions, are a great exercise for building size and strength in the triceps.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.description: Overhead tricep extensions target the long head of the tricep, promoting muscle growth and definition.

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
exercises.description: Cable tricep pushdowns isolate the tricep muscles, enhancing size and strength.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Pull-ups are a bodyweight exercise that target the upper back, shoulders, and arms.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Deadlifts are a compound exercise that target multiple muscle groups including the back, legs, and core.

exercises.name: Bent-over Rows
exercises.description: Bent-over rows are a compound exercise that target the muscles of the upper back, shoulders, and arms.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.description: Lat pulldowns target the latissimus dorsi muscles, promoting back strength and width.

exercises.name: T-Bar Rows
exercises.description: T-bar rows focus on the middle back and promote overall back thickness and strength.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Squats are a fundamental lower body exercise that target the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and core.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Lunges are a unilateral lower body exercise that target the quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes, and calves.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: Leg press is a machine-based exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlifts
exercises.description: Romanian deadlifts target the hamstrings and glutes, promoting strength and flexibility.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Calf raises target the calf muscles, promoting size and definition.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Shoulder press is a compound exercise that targets the deltoid muscles of the shoulders.

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: Lateral raises are an isolation exercise that target the lateral deltoids, helping to build shoulder width and definition.

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: Front raises target the anterior deltoids, helping to build shoulder strength and definition.

exercises.name: Reverse Flyes
exercises.description: Reverse flyes target the posterior deltoids, helping to improve shoulder balance and posture.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: Arnold press is a variation of the shoulder press that targets all three heads of the deltoid muscle.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Crunches are a classic abdominal exercise that target the rectus abdominis, helping to build core strength and definition.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Plank is a static core exercise that engages multiple muscle groups including the Abs, obliques, and lower back.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Russian twists are an effective exercise for targeting the obliques, helping to build rotational strength and stability.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Leg raises target the lower abdominal muscles, promoting core strength and stability.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: Bicycle crunches target the rectus abdominis and obliques, helping to build a strong and defined core.
